byline.original: By FRANCES ROBLES and ALAN BLINDER

abstract: Rev George D Hamilton, pastor at WORD Ministries Christian Center in South Carolina, tells congregation that former church member Walter L Scott was killed by Police Officer Michael T Slager because he was black; Hamilton says most officers serve honorably but urges congregation to raise issue of racism in law enforcement to Washington lawmakers.
lead_paragraph: Mourners lined up at the church in South Carolina on Saturday, including many who had never met Mr. Scott, and heard a pastor denounce racism.

headline.main: Pastor Denounces Racism at Walter Scott’s Funeral One Week After Police Shooting
headline.print_headline: Pastor Denounces Racism at Funeral of Man Killed by South Carolina Officer
